jobDescription: Brain Corp is a San Diego-based A.I. company that specializes in the development of self-driving technology. Our A.I. tech represents the next generation of artificial brains for robots - it enables machines to perceive, learn, and navigate complex environments, while avoiding people and obstacles. We partner with commercial equipment manufacturers, and global consumer electronics brands, to transform their products into self-driving robots.  We are looking for candidates with advanced knowledge in the fields of machine learning and adaptive data processing.  As a core member of our AI Division, you will work with our world-class team of engineers and scientists to build a platform for the next generation of intelligent machines. Your experience will be pivotal in advancing our mission: safe and reliable robots everywhere.
